Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot
Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.fluent

Class ScatterStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.fluent.ScatterStyle
  • public class ScatterStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent interface responsible of storing styling elements to a Series object. Provides functionallity to set the following properties in a single method chain: Color, Width, Marker.
    Author:
    Tóth Bálint

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ScatterStyle()
      Default constructs a ScatterStyle object.

        public static ScatterStyle marker()
        Fluent interface starter method with empty parameter list. Creates a new instance with the default marker.
        Returns:
        new instance.

      • marker

        public static ScatterStyle marker​(Marker.MarkerType marker)
        Fluent interface starter method with marker setting.
        Parameters:
        marker - marker as enumerated value (ASTERISK, CIRCLE, CROSS, DOT, PLUS, NONE).
        Returns:
        new instance.

      • marker

        public static ScatterStyle marker​(java.lang.String marker)
        Fluent interface starter method with marker setting as MATLAB format string.
        Parameters:
        marker - marker as string value ("*", "o", "X", ".", "+").
        Returns:
        new instance.

      • size

        public ScatterStyle size​(double... size)
        Fluent interface method. Sets the sizes of the markers representing data points. If only one value is given, the markers will be uniform size.
        Parameters:
        size - variadic amout (or array) of sizes.
        Returns:
        itself.

      • color

        public ScatterStyle color​(javafx.scene.paint.Paint... color)
        Fluent interface method. Sets the colors of the markers representing data points. If only one value is given, the markers will be uniform color.
        Parameters:
        color - variadic amount of colors.
        Returns:
        itself.

      • color

        public ScatterStyle color​(java.lang.String... col)
        Fluent interface method. Sets the colors of the markers representing data points. If only one value is given, the markers will be uniform color. Accepted colors: red (r), green (g), blue (b), black (k), yellow (y), cyan (c), magenta (m).
        Parameters:
        col - variadic amount of color strings.
        Returns:
        itself.

      • getColor

        public javafx.scene.paint.Paint[] getColor()
        Query for marker color array.
        Returns:
        colors.

        public double[] getSize()
        Query for marker size array.
        Returns:
        sizes

      • getMarker

        public Marker.MarkerType getMarker()
        Query for the marker type.
        Returns:
        marker type.

      • setAttrib

        public void setAttrib​(java.lang.String pair)
        Can be used to set the attributes as string "key;value" pair.
        Parameters:
        pair - a name and an attribute value separated by a semicolon as a string.
